Wisdom: الْصَقْ بِأَهْلِ الْخَيْرِ وَالْوَرَعِ وَرَضِّهِمْ عَلَى أَنْ لَا يَطْرُوكَ فَإِنَّ كَثْرَةَ الْإِطْرَاءِ تُدْنِي مِنَ الْعِزَّةِ وَالرِّضَا بِذَلِكَ يُوجِبُ مِنَ اللَّهِ الْمَقْتَ
enWisdom: Cling to the people of virtue and piety, and request them not compliment you, for indeed excessive praise brings one close to being deceived [about his true status] and being pleased with it causes the displeasure of Allah
A good companion is a blessing
The best choice is accompanying the righteous
The best choice is making friends with the virtuous

Wisdom: صُحْبَةُ الْأَخْيَارِ تَكْسِبُ الْخَيْرَ كَالرِّيحِ إِذَا مَرَّتْ بِالطِّيبِ حَمَلَتْ طِيباً
enWisdom: Companionship with the righteous leads one to acquire righteousness just like the wind when it passes by perfume, it carries the fragrance

Wisdom: قَارِنْ أَهْلَ الْخَيْرِ تَكُنْ مِنْهُمْ وَبَايِنْ أَهْلَ الشَّرِّ تَبِنْ عَنْهُمْ
enWisdom: An evil companion is the worst of companions; and the disease of ignobility is a concealed disease
One of the best choices is accompanying the virtuous

Wisdom: مِنْ حُسْنِ الِاخْتِيَارِ مُقَارَنَةُ الْأَخْيَارِ وَمُفَارَقَةُ الْأَشْرَارِ
enWisdom: From the good choices [one makes] is keeping company with the virtuous and keeping a distance from the wicked
ocial interaction with people of merits is enlivening for the hearts
Sitting in the company of the virtuous brings honour
